t: Discover Studio M
s: With just $20 and a unique vision, Sue and Curt designed the first magnetic mailbox cover, and the MailWraps® was born. The brand-new company, then known as Magnet Works, Ltd., eventually gained its first two employees—Curt’s mom and Sue’s mom.

t: Amazon.com: Studio M
s: We are proud to offer an array of beautiful home décor and unique yard decorations that help people express their creative spirit. Every product we make starts as a piece of artwork created by an independent artist—sketches, paintings, graphic illustrations, and more.

t: Home & Yard Decorations | Outdoor Décor​| Studio M
s: Bring unique artwork to yard decorations for your outdoor environment. Choose from flags, decorative house numbers, entry décor, planters, and more!
